waddington.kai.main.knnf.serialisation

Class NetworkSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.serialisation.NetworkSaver

  • public class NetworkSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles saving a neural network model that was created by this package. The model file will be placed in the appropriate location. The model file will be a .zip file containing a directory for the model. Inside this directory is a .json file containing information about the NetworkManager, as well as this, there is a directory for each layer. Inside the layer directories is a .json file containing information for that layer, as well as this there is a directory for the neurons in that layer. Inside this directory there is a .json file for each neuron.

    • Method Detail

      • createTempFileStructure

        private static void createTempFileStructure(NetworkManager networkManager,
                                            java.lang.String pathToRoot,
                                            java.lang.String tempDirName,
                                            java.lang.String saveDirName)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a temporary directory structure where all of the model save files will be located before being zipped up. Creates the main directory as well as all sub-directories for layers and neurons.
        Parameters:
        networkManager - The NetworkManager instance to save.
        pathToRoot - A locally set path to the root of the project.
        tempDirName - The name of the temporary directory.
        saveDirName - The directory where the model save file will be placed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the directories cannot be created.

        tempDirName - The name of the temporary directory.
        saveDirName - The directory where the model save file will be placed.
        Throws:

        private static void removeTempFiles(java.lang.String pathToRoot,
                                    java.lang.String tempDirName)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Removes the temporary directory/files once the model has been saved.
        Parameters:
        pathToRoot - A locally set path to the root of the project.
        tempDirName - The name of the temporary directory.
        Throws:

      • saveNetwork

        public static void saveNetwork(NetworkManager networkManager,
                               java.lang.String networkReference)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.Exception
        This method is called to save a network model.
        Parameters:
        networkManager - The NetworkManager instance to save.
        networkReference - The name that the model will be saved as. This is currently auto-generated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the network cannot be saved.
        java.lang.Exception - When various directories and files cannot be created.
